attributes.action: support the application of Mr Richard Hammond as Chief Scout of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Richard Hammond, an adventurous and popular figure, would make an ideal role model for Britain's Scout movement.

Richard, known from his adventures on BBC TV's Top Gear and Sky's Braniac, loves the outdoors and always gives things a go.
 
As Peter Duncan retires from his role as Chief, it's time to find someone to replace him.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
